name: Where's My $%^& Lunch?
description:
Where's my $%$^ lunch!?! 

Use bombs, gravity wells and portals to help guide the player to their lunch!

The theme was "Out of Control" so no direct control of the player. All you can do is place and move (some) objects in the scene. Press "GO!" and see what happens. 

Instructions to Play:

  • Click and move the "TNT" box around to aim the player
  • Add objects with the buttons on the top left
  • Objects can be moved after being placed by left-clicking
  • Placed objects can (mostly) be deleted by right clicking
  • Press "GO!" to test your solution
  • Press "Reset" to put the player back at the start
